instruction: Convert the following text into another form of media.
input: The storm had passed and the sun shone brightly in the sky.
output:
The storm had passed and the sun shone brightly in the sky. (Audio Narrative) 
The thunder clapped and the wind howled its way around the town, but when the clouds parted, the sun's rays spilled through, warming the ground and brightening even the darkest of spirits.  The town rejoiced in the sunlight, basking in its warmth.
